attributes.additional_details:
For too long the English have been disadvantaged by the asymmetrical devolution within the UK.
Many of the issues that have been devolved are rigorously discussed in the Celtic countries. Indeed the Scots and Welsh are demanding and receiving more concessions by the day. The English people feel that no-one is speaking up for them.
If the UK is going to move forward together a central English Parliament must be established, free of British rule, on the subjects that are currently devolved to the other constituent parts of the UK.
The English are a proud nation and demand that our voice is heard. We can no longer be the last colony of the fading British Empire.
Our time has come and we demand our freedom.
